alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:29PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Line of thunderstorms along Montana Divide northwest of Island Park region moving northeast toward Henrys Lake through 500 PM MDT... At 426 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles northwest of West Yellowstone to near Henrys Lake to 6 miles west of Shotgun Village, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 30 mph, pea size hail, and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs, blow around unsecured objects and create difficult boating conditions on area lakes. Locations impacted include... Henrys Lake, Island Park Village, Shotgun Village, Ponds Lodge, Macks Inn, Island Park Reservoir, and Targhee Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
